title: La Rixe (The Brawl)
medium: etching and wash manner, printed in blue, red, yellow, white, green, and black inks
dimensions:
Overall (outer framing line): 31 x 23.5 cm (12 3/16 x 9 1/4 in.)
plate: 39.2 x 29 cm (15 7/16 x 11 7/16 in.)
attribution: Charles-Melchior Descourtis after Nicolas Antoine Taunay
